title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Ian O’Connor on LIV vs. PGA, Giants Rebuild, 1st Place Mets/Yankees
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Ian O’Connor on LIV vs. PGA, Giants Rebuild, 1st Place Mets/Yankees
description:
First, Fake Questions, Real Answers (3:00), including if Colin regrets his pre-draft take questioning KD, why the NBA Draft doesn't resonate like the NFL Draft, what it would take to for the NFL to boot embattled Washington Owner Dan Snyder, if the outrage over the LIV Golf exodus is warranted, why fans deny reality, and if the “old media” should be threatened by the “new media” of current athletes. 

Then, Ian O'Connor -- NY Post columnist and author of Belichick -- and Colin discuss the long-term impact of of top PGA golfers leaving for the Saudi LIV tour (19:00), if the Giants can turn things around under another new regime (26:00), if the 1st place Mets can win the World Series (30:00), and the pressure on the Yankees to win it all this year (38:00).

Make sure you follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action! #herd

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
